name: The Palmehouse
description:
Have you ever wondered which of the Palmesans would shit themselves to death? How about who would get stabbed first?

Wonder no more, for The Palmehouse is here and will answer all of your questions! Pick the Palmesans you want to observe and let them live their life!

They'll cook, watch TV, chat with each other and you just have to sit back and enjoy the show.

Features

- Watch palmesans as they live in the same house and do daily activities on their own.
- They all have needs which need to be satisfied: sleep, hunger, toilet, hygiene, fun, and social!
- Watch them form relationships and love (and fuck) or hate (and kill) each other!
- They will die a terrible death. I'm not sorry about that I think it's funny.
- Connect to your Twitch Stream and start predictions automatically! Let's see who can guess what's going to happen next!

Credits

- Character designs by Andy/Currypaws!
- Game dev by MonAmiral!
- Music by Dee Yan Key.
- Ambience by Moulaythami.
- SFX by yetcop, 13F_Panska_Koprivikova_Klara, hinzebeat, Trollarch2, NachtmahrTV, deleted_user_7146007, rbirdwise.
- Features deep fried versions of Puthiya Manidha, Sunflower, Who's the (bat)man, Silver Valley Stables, and Sex Demon Queen.
